name: Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars
summary: An arena-based vehicle game inspired by soccer(football), Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars is Psyonix Studios's first original game released on the Playstation Network. "SARPBC" contains YouTube, local and online multiplayer, as well as trophy support.  "SARPBC" has pre-emptively won an award for "The Greatest Game Name of All Time".
info:
• 开发: Psyonix
  • 发行: Psyonix
  • 平台: PlayStation Network (PS3)
  • 游戏类型: Driving/Racing、Vehicular Combat、Soccer
  • 发行日期: 2008年10月9日
